All Classes

Class Description
CalendarView
Class representing a calendar page.
Client
Class representing the start of the application.
Component
Abstract class for the javafx:controllers linked with a fxml file.
CreateProjectView
Class representing the view for creating a new user project Linked with the CreateProjectView.fxml file.
CreateTaskView
Class representing the view for creating a new task.
Default  
DragAndDropManager
Class responsible for setting and getting the Object that is currently being dragged.
EditOrCreateProjectView
Abstract class representing edit or create project view.
EditOrCreateTaskView
Abstract class representing edit or create task view.
EditProjectView
Class representing the view for editing an existing user project Linked with the EditProjectView.fxml file.
EditTaskView
Class representing the view for editing a task.
EnumToStringConverter<T>
Class for converting enums in the format "LOREM_IPSUM" to a string in the format "Lorem ipsum".
EnumToStringConverterTest  
FileManager
Class with static methods for loading and saving files.
FileManagerTest  
FontSizeEnum
An enum representing the different font sizes the application can have.
MainMenu
The main menu has a treeView that it fills with TreeItems containing MainMenuItems containing a View.
MainMenuItem
Class representing a item in the main menu with a text-label link to a view and a context menu.
PrimaryView
The PrimaryView contains the main menu and the content.
PriorityEnum
An enum representing the different priorities a task can have.
Project
Abstract class representing a Project with an ID, a list of tasks and a list of projects.
ProjectTest  
ProjectView
Class representing the page for a project.
ProjectView.ShowOption  
ProjectView.SortOption  
RepeatEnum
An enum representing the different repeating frequencies a task can have.
RootProject
A class representing the root project containing all other projects and a list of tasks representing the quick tasks.
Settings
A class representing the application settings.
SettingsView
Class representing the settings page.
SoundEffects
Class responsible for sound effects.
SubProjectComponent
Class representing a subproject component displayed in ProjectView when the show option is set to subproject.
Task
A class representing a task consisting of an id, title, comments, priority and end/start date repeating period and is-done status.
TaskComponent
Class representing a task component displayed in CalendarView and ProjectView when the show option is set to tasks or all tasks.
TaskListSorter
Class containing sorting logic for ArrayLists of Task objects.
TaskListSorterTest  
TaskTest  
UserProject
A class representing a project made by the user.
UserProjectTest  
View
Abstract class representing a page.
